{{VO/Story
|character           = Thoma
|language            = ko
|name                = 토마

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 만나서 반가워, 이방에서 온 여행자. 네 이름은 익히 들어서 알고 있어. 너만 괜찮다면 나 토마는 오늘부터 네 친구야
|vo_01_01_rm         = Mannaseo bangawo, ibang'eseo on yeohaengja. Ne ireumeun ikhi deureoseo algo isseo. Neoman gwaenchantamyeon na Tomaneun oneulbuteo ne chin'guya.
|vo_01_01_tl         = Nice to meet you, Traveler from a foreign land. I know about your name, since I've heard a lot about you. If you're okay with it, I, Thoma, will be your friend from today.

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・초대
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: {character}'s Treat
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Thoma's Treat.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 음… 언제 한번 같이 좋은 거 먹으러 갈까? 내가 살게
|vo_02_01_rm         = Eum... Eonje hangeon gachi joeun geo meogeureo galkka? Naega salge.
|vo_02_01_tl         = Hmm... Do you want to go and eat something delicious some time? My treat.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・걱정
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Concern
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Concern.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 뭔가 까먹은 거 같은데… 정원도 치웠고, 차도 달였고. 음… 내 착각인가 봐
|vo_02_02_rm         = Mwonga kkameogeun geo gateunde... Jeongwondo chiwotgo, chado dalyeotgo. Eum... nae chakgaginga bwa.
|vo_02_02_tl         = I feel like I forgot something... I cleaned the garden, and I boiled the tea down. Hmm... It must be my delusion.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・모라
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Mora
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Mora.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 요 며칠 돈을 너무 많이 써서 10모라 밖에 안 남았어. 하지만 10모라라도 남아서 다행이야!
|vo_02_03_rm         = Yo meochil doneul neomu mani sseoso sipmora bakke an namasseo. Hajiman sipmorarado namaseo dahaeng'iya!
|vo_02_03_tl         = I have used too much money these days that I only have 10 mora. But it's still a relief that I have 10 mora!

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 갑자기 비가 오잖아? 괜찮아? 내 외투로 좀 막아줄까?
|vo_03_01_rm         = Gapjagi biga ojana? Gwaenchana? Nae oeturo jom magajulkka?
|vo_03_01_tl         = It's suddenly raining, huh? Are you okay? Should I cover you up with my jacket?

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 이런 날씨엔 밖에서 돌아다니면 안 돼, 그러다 벼락 맞아
|vo_03_02_rm         = Ireon nalssien bakkeseo doradanimyeon an dwae, geuroda byeorak maja.
|vo_03_02_tl         = You shouldn't go outside in this weather, or you'll get struck by lightning.

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 눈 밭에서 뛰지 마. 넘어져도 안 도와줄 거야
|vo_03_03_rm         = Nun bateseo ttwiji ma. Neomeojyeodo an dowajul geoya.
|vo_03_03_tl         = Don't run in the snow. I won't help you even you fall down.

|vo_03_04_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 날씨 진짜 좋다. 같이 산책할까
|vo_03_04_rm         = Nalssi jinjja jota. Gachi sanchaekhalkka?
|vo_03_04_tl         = The weather's amazing. Should we walk around together?

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침, 안 바쁘면 나랑 같이 장 보러 갈래? 아침 채소가 제일 신선하거든
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achim, an bappeumyeon narang gachi jang boreo gallae? Achim chaesoga jeil sinseonhageodeun.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning, if you're not busy, would you like to go shopping with me? Morning vegetables are the freshest.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 오늘 점심엔 벚꽃 모둠튀김 말고 삼색 경단도 있어! 자, 너랑 페이몬, 그리고 아야카 아가씨와 가주님 것도 있어… 어 잠깐, 내 걸 깜빡했네
|vo_04_02_rm         = Oneul jeomsimen beotkkot moduntwigim malgo samsaek gyeongdando isseo! Ja, neorang Peimon, geurigo Ayaka agassiwa gajunim geotdo isseo... Eo jamkkan, nae geol kkamppakhaetne.
|vo_04_02_tl         = For today's lunch, we have Tricolor Dango instead of Sakura Tempura as well! Here, I have yours, Paimon's, and Miss Ayaka's and the head of the household... Oh, I forgot mine.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 빨리빨리, 이 시간에 시장에 가면 생선을 훨씬 싸게 살 수 있어. 사고 싶은 거 있으면 말해, 내가 흥정해 줄게
|vo_04_03_rm         = Ppallippalli, i sigane sijang'e gamyeon saengseoneul hwolssin ssage sal su isseo. Sago sipeun geo isseumyeon malhae, naega heungjeonghae julge.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Come on, when we go to the marketplace at this hour of the day, you can buy fish in a much lower price. Tell me if you want to buy something, I'll bargain for you.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 응, 잘 자. 너도 오늘 고생했어. 밤샐 생각 말고 어서 가서 쉬어
|vo_04_04_rm         = Eung, jal ja. Neodo oneul gosaenghaesseo. Bamsael saenggak malgo eoseo gaseo swieo.
|vo_04_04_tl         = Mhm, good night. You went through a hardship today, too. Don't think of staying up all night, go rest.

|vo_05_01_title      = 토마 자신에 대해・가사 관리원
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Housekeeper
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Housekeeper.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 아야카 아가씨랑 가주님 모두 처음엔 나에게 집안일을 시키실 생각이 없었어. 내가 자진해서 맡은 거지! 난 질서정연하게 정리하는 걸 좋아해. 되게 성취감 있거든! 사람들의 반응을 보면… 음, 내 실력이 꽤 괜찮은가 봐
|vo_05_01_rm         = Ayaka agassirang gajunim modu cheoeumen naege jibanileul sikisil saenggagi eopsseosseo. Naega jajinhaeseo mateun geoji! Nan jilseojeong'yeonhage jeongrihaneun geol joahae. Doege seongchwigam itgeodeun! Saramdeurui baneung'eul bomyeon... Eum, nae sillyeogi kkwae gwaenchaneunga bwa.
|vo_05_01_tl         = Miss Ayaka and the head of Kamisato Clan both initially did not have thoughts to let me do housework. I volunteered to do it! I love organizing things. It makes me feel a sense of accomplishment! When I look at people's reactions... Hmm, I may be quite skilled at this.

|vo_05_02_title      = 토마 자신에 대해・의미
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Meaning
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Meaning.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 사는 곳을 깨끗이 청소하고 가지런히 정리해서 여기 사는 모든 사람들을 웃게 하는 게. 바로 집안일을 하는 의미지. 지금은… 네 몫까지 더 열심히 할 거야
|vo_05_02_rm         = Sanenun goseul kkaekkeusi cheongsohago gajireonhi jeongrihaeseo yeogi saneun modeun saramdeureul utge haneun ge. Baro jibanireul haneun uimiji. Jigeumeun... ne motkkaji deo yeolsimhi hal geoya.
|vo_05_02_tl         = Making everyone who live here smile by cleaning and organizing where you live. The meaning of doing housework. Now... I'll work even harder for your share.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・혼밥
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Eating Alone
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Eating Alone.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 왜 여기서 혼자 조용히 밥 먹고 있어? …음, 나랑 같이 먹을래? 아니면 그냥 혼자 먹는 게 편해?
|vo_06_01_rm         = Wae yeogiseo honja joyonghi bap meokgo isseo? ...Eum, narang gachi meogeullae? Animyeon geunyang honja meokneun ge pyeonhae?
|vo_06_01_tl         = Why are you eating by yourself quietly? ...Hmm, do you want to eat with me? Or is eating alone more comfortable for you?

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・맹세
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Oath
|vo_06_02_friendship = 4
|vo_06_02_quest      = Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Oath.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 네가 「수안 의식」에서 홀로 쇼군과 맞서 싸우지 않았다면, 나는 신의 눈과 염원을 잃었을 거야. 계속 생각해 봤는데, 이렇게 해야만 네 각오에 부응할 수 있을 것 같아&mdash;&mdash;<br />나, 토마는 내 무예와 충성을 바쳐 무슨 일이 있든 널 위해 싸우겠다고 맹세할게
|vo_06_02_rm         = Nega "Suan Uisik"eseo hollo Syogungwa matseo ssauji anatdamyeon, naneun sin-ui nungwa yeomwoneul ireosseul geoya. Gyesok saenggakhae bwatneunde, ireotge haeyaman ne gagoe bueunghal su isseul geot gata &mdash;<br />Na, Tomaneun nae muyewa chungseong'eul bacheo museun iri itdeun neol wihae ssaugetdago maengsehalge.
|vo_06_02_tl         = If you did not fight the Shogun by yourself in the "Vision Hunt Ceremony", I would have lost my vision and wish. Thinking of it, doing this will meet your determination&mdash;&mdash;<br />I, Thoma, will vow to fight for you, offering my martial arts skills and fidelity, at any occasion.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 신의 눈을 얻은 이상 소중히 여겨야지. 잃어버리고 싶지 않아
|vo_07_01_rm         = Sin-ui nuneul eodeun isang sojunghi yeogyeoyaji. Ireobeorigo sipji ana.
|vo_07_01_tl         = Since I got a vision, I should cherish it. I don't want to lose it.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 오랫동안 사람들과 교류한 경험에 의하면, 몬드에 비해 이나즈마에서 예를 더 중요시하는 것 같아. 충분한 예를 갖춘다면 일 처리가 한결 더 편해질 거야
|vo_07_02_rm         = Oraetdong'an saramdeulgwa gyoryuhan gyeongheome uihamyeon, Mondeue bihae Inajeumaeseo yereul deo jungyosihaneun geot gata. Chungbunhan yereul gatchundamyeon il cheoriga hangyeol deo pyeonhaejil geoya.
|vo_07_02_tl         = From my experience of exchanging with people for a long time, I think Inazuma considers manners more than Mondstadt. If you have enough courtsey, working on something will be easier.

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일・너구리
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things: Tanuki
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Tanuki.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 너구리의 변신 방법이 늘 궁금했어. 소문에 의하면 너구리는 다양한 모습으로 변해서 사람들이랑 장난치는 걸 좋아한대. 엄청 유머러스한 동물이야
|vo_07_03_rm         = Neoguri-ui byeonsin bangbeobi neul gunggeumhaesseo. Somune uihamyeon neogurineun dayanghan moseubeuro byeonhaeseo saramdeurirang jangnanchineun geol joahande. Eomcheong yumeoreosuhan dongmuriya.
|vo_07_03_tl         = I was always curious of a racoon's transformation methods. As rumors say, a racoon transforms into various forms and like to prank people. It's a very humorous animal.

|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일・동물
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things: Animals
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Animals.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 동물 좋아해? 좋아하면 다음에 같이 교외로 나가보자. 내가 휘파람을 불면 작은 강아지랑 고양이들이 뛰쳐나와서 너한테 애교를 부릴 거야. 하하, 상상만 해도 기분 좋아지네
|vo_07_04_rm         = Dongmul joahae? Joahamyeon daeume gachi gyo'oero nagaboja. Naega hwiparameul bulmyeon jageun gang'ajrang goyang'ideuri ttwichyeonawaseo neohante aegyoreul buril geoya. Haha, sangsangman haedo gibun joajine.
|vo_07_04_tl         = Do you like animals? If you like them, let's go outside the city next time. When I whistle, puppies and kitties will appear and act charming to you. Haha, even imagining it makes me happy.

|vo_08_01_title      = 야에 미코에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Yae Miko]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yae Miko.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 미코 님? 가, 갑자기 왜 그분은 왜? 아가씨가 전갈을 보내실 때마다 제일 가기 싫은 곳이 바로 나루카미 다이샤야. 아, 딱히 미코 님 기세에 눌려서 그러는 건 아니야. 음… 경외… 그래 경외심 때문이지! 아하하하…
|vo_08_01_rm         = Miko nim? Ga, gapjagi wae geubeuneun wae? Agassiga jeongareul bonaesil ttaemada jeil gagi sireul gosi baro Narukami Daisyaya. A, ttakhi Miko nim gise'e nullyeoseo geureoneun geon aniya. Eum... Gyeong'oe... geurae gyeong'oesim ttaemuniji! Ahahaha...
|vo_08_01_tl         = Miss Miko? W, What about her? Whenever Miss Ayaka sends a message, where I like the least to go is the Grand Narukami Shrine. Ah, it's not like I'm overwhelmed by Miss Miko's attitude. Hmm... Awe... Yeah, it's because of awe! Ahahaha...

|vo_08_02_title      = 라이덴 쇼군에 대해・비교
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]: Comparison
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun - Comparison.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 내 고향 몬드에선 대부분 사람이 바람 신 바르바토스 님을 존경해. 하지만 쇼군에 대한 이나즈마 사람들의 태도는 좀 달라. 뭐랄까… 추대와 감사의 마음 말고 약간의 두려움도 있지
|vo_08_02_rm         = Nae gohyang Mondeueseon daebubun sarami baram sin Bareubatoseu nimeul jon'gyeonghae. Hajiman Syogune daehan Inajeuma saramdeurui taedoneun jom dalla. Mworalkka... Chudaewa gamsa-ui maeum malgo yakganui duryeoumdo itji.
|vo_08_02_tl         = In my hometown Mondstadt, almost everyone respects the Anemo Archon Barbatos. But Inazumans' attitude towards Shogun are a little different. How do I put it... Other than appointment and gratitude, they have a bit of fear, too.

|vo_08_03_title      = 라이덴 쇼군에 대해・미지
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About the Raiden Shogun: The Unknown
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_quest      = Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun - The Unknown.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 사실 난 쇼군님을 그렇게 원망하지 않아. 그분이 내 신의 눈을 뺏어갈 뻔했지만, 워낙 특수한 입장이시니까. 입장이 다른 건 어쩔 수 없지. 내가 이해할 수 없는 건 그분의 목적이야. 그분이 생각하는 영원의 국가는 대체 어떤 모습이지? 그리고 왜 꼭 백성들의 염원을 희생해야 하는 건지. 난 이해할 수도, 인정할 수도 없어
|vo_08_03_rm         = Sasil nan Syogunnimeul geureotge wonmanghaji ana. Geubuni nae sin-ui nuneun ppaeseogal ppeonhaetjiman, wonak teuksuhan ipjang'isinikka. Ipjang'i dareun geon eojjeol su eopji. Naega ihaehal su eopneun geon geubunui mokjeogiya. Geubuni saenggakhaneun yeong'wonui gukganeun daeche eotteon moseubiji? Geurigo wae kkok baekseongdeurui yeomwoneul huisaenghaeya haneun geonji. Nan ihaehal sudo, injeonghal sudo eopsseo.
|vo_08_03_tl         = I actually don't bear a grudge against the Shogun that much. She could have took my vision away, but she was in a special position. I can't do anything about different positions. What I cannot understand is her objective. What does a land of eternity in her eyes look like? And why the peoples' wish should be sacrificed. I cannot understand, nor concede.

|vo_08_04_title      = 북두에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_quest      = Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 「남십자」 함대의 누님은 정말 시원시원한 사람이야. 예전에 날 데리고 먼 외해에 나가서 모든 걸 봉쇄해 버리는 뇌폭이 어떤 모습인지 보여주겠다고 약속했어. 아쉽게도 계속 보러 갈 기회가 없었지만…
|vo_08_04_rm         = "Namsipja" hamdae-ui nunimeun jeongmal siwonsiwonhan saramiya. Yejone nal derigo meon oehae'e nagaseo modeun geol bongswaehae beorineun noepogi eotteon moseubinji boyeojugetdago yaksokhaesseo. Aswipgedo gyesok boreo gal gihoega eopsseotjiman...
|vo_08_04_tl         = The captain of "The Crux" is a very straightforward person. She promised me that she would take me outside and show me what a thunder that blocks everything looks like a long time ago. Sadly, there was no opportunity to go and look at that, though...

|vo_08_05_title      = 카미사토 아야토에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayato]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayato.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 가주님도 쉽지만은 않으실 거야. 시국은 혼란스럽고 민심은 불안한데다가 동료들 중엔 탐관오리도 섞여 있으니 말이야, 생각만 해도 머리 아파. 내가 할 수 있는 건 그분이 좀 더 편하게 생활하실 수 있게 돕는 거지
|vo_08_05_rm         = Gajunimdo swipjimaneun aneuisil geoya. Sigugeun honranseureopgo minsimeun buranhandedaga dongryodeul jung'en tamgwanorido seokkyeo isseuni mariya, saenggakman haedo meori apa. Naega hal su itneun geon geubuni jom deo pyeonhage saenghwalhasil su itge dopneun geoji.
|vo_08_05_tl         = The head of Kamisato Clan musn't have an easy time. The situatin is confusing, the people are feeling uneasy, and in between colleagues we have corrupt officials as well, only thinking of it gives me a headache. What I can do is to help him have a more comfortable daily life.

|vo_08_06_title      = 카미사토 아야카에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayaka]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_quest      = Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayaka.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 아아캬 아가씨는 교양 있고 마음씨도 착하고 단아하시지만, 솔직하진 못하셔. 참, 나중에 아가씨가 또 하고 싶은 말을 참는 것 같으면, 네가 꼭 먼저 이것저것 많이 물어봐 줘
|vo_08_06_rm         = Ayaka agassineun gyoyang itgo maeunssido chakhago danahasijiman, soljikhajin mothasyeo. Cham, najung'e agassiga tto hago sipeun mareul chamneun geot gateumyeon, nega kkok meonjeo igeotjeogeot mani mureobwa jwo.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Miss Ayaka is refined, kind, and elegant, but she isn't true to herself. Ah, if you feel like Miss is stopping from what she wants to speak, please ask many things to her first.

|vo_08_07_title      = 요이미야에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Yoimiya]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yoimiya.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 「나가노하라 폭죽가게」의 점장? 쉽게 친해질 수 있는 시원시원한 타입이야. 아 참, 그 가게에서 만든 폭죽도 아주 대단해. 기회 되면 많이 봐봐. 자, 여기 쿠폰
|vo_08_07_rm         = "Naganohara Pokjukgage"ui jeomjang? Swipge chinhaejil su itneun siwonsiwonhan taibiya. A cham, geu gage'eseo mandeun pokjukdo aju daedanhae. Gihoe doemyeon mani bwabwa. Ja, yeogi kupon.
|vo_08_07_tl         = The store manager of "Naganohara Fireworks"? She is a straightforward person who you can get close quite fast. Ah, the fireworks from the store is also amazing, too. If you have an opportunity, take a look at them. Here's a coupon.

|vo_08_08_title      = 사유에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Sayu]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sayu.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 휴, 사유는 고집이 너무 세. 몇 번이나 찾아갔는데도 인술을 안 알려주더라고. 심지어 요즘은 일부러 날 피하는 것 같아…. 스승님으로 모시려던 것뿐인데, 내가 너무 오버했나?
|vo_08_08_rm         = Hyu, Sayuneun gojibi neomu se. Myeot beonina chajagatneundedo insureul an allyeojudeorago. Simjieo yojeumeun ilbureo nal pihaneun geot gata... Seuseungnimeuro mosiryeodeon geotppuninde, naega neomu obeohaetna?
|vo_08_08_tl         = Phew, Sayu is too stubborn. I have visited her multiple times, but she won't teach me ninja skills. What's worse, it seems like she's deliberately avoiding me these days... I just wanted to make her be my teacher, was it too much of me?

|vo_08_09_title      = 쿠죠 사라에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Kujou Sara]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 그 텐료 봉행 휘하의 장교는, 음… 그녀와 교섭할 땐 매우 신중해야 해. 실권을 쥐고 있는 데다 좀 고집스러워서 장난스러운 태도로는 절대 안 통하거든
|vo_08_09_rm         = Geu Tenryo bonghaeng hwihaui janggyoneun, eum... geunyeowa gyoseophal ttaen maeu sinjunghaeya hae. Silgwoneul jwigo itneun deda jom gojipseureowoseo jangnanseureoun taedoroneun jeoldae an tonghageodeun.
|vo_08_09_tl         = The officer under Tenryou Commission is, hmm... When negotiating with her, you must be very careful. She has power, and she's a bit stubborn as well, so a careless manner won't work to her.

|vo_08_10_title      = 아라타키 이토에 대해…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Arataki Itto]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Arataki Itto.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 항간에 떠도는 소문 속의 괴상한 자야. 듣기론 요괴의 피가 섞였다던데, 본 적 있어? 친하면 나도 좀 소개해 줘. 친구를 많이 사귀는 건 좋은 일이잖아… 요괴 친구도 포함이지!
|vo_08_10_rm         = Hanggane tteodoneun somun sogui goesanghan jaya. Deutgiron yogoe-ui piga seokkyeotdadeonde, bon jeok isseo? Chinhamyeon nado jom sogaehae jwo. Chin'gureul mani sagwineun geon joeun irijana... Yogoe chingudo pohamiji!
|vo_08_10_tl         = He's the bizarre guy in the rumours. I heard that he has oni blood, have you seen him? If you're close with him, please introduce me as well. Having many friends is a good thing... Including an oni friend!

|vo_08_11_title      = 시카노인 헤이조에 대해…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Shikanoin Heizou]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shikanoin Heizou.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 허, 그는 텐료 봉행 쪽의 「탐정」이야. 제멋대로인 인상을 줘서 친해지기 쉽지 않지. 게다가 탐정이 필요한 상황은 보통 좋은 일이 없잖아. 난 웬만하면 폭풍의 중심에서 좀 멀어지려고
|vo_08_11_rm         = Heo, geuneun Tenryo bonghaeng jjogui "Tamjeong"iya. Jemotdaeroin insang'eul jwoso chinhaejigi swipji anchi. Gedaga tamjeong'i piryohan sanghwang'eun botong joeun iri eopjana. Nan wenmanhamyeon pokpung-ui jungsimeseo jom meoreojiryeogo.
|vo_08_11_tl         = Huh, he's a "Detective" from the Tenryou Commission. He gives me such a self-centered impression that it's hard to get close to him. And a situation where we need a detective isn't usually a good thing. I'd like to stray away from the eye of the storm.

|vo_08_12_title      = 진에 대해…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 군힐드 가문의 진 씨가 페보니우스 기사단 단장이 됐다고? 확실히 잘 어울려, 그녀의 능력과 정직함은 유명하니까… 아, 아직은 단장 대행이구나? 하하, 그런 명칭이 뭐가 중요하겠어
|vo_08_12_rm         = Gunhildeu gamunui Jin ssiga Peboniuseu gisadan danjang'i dwaetdago? Hwaksilhi hal eoullyeo, geunyeo-ui neungryeokgwa jeongjikhameun yumyeonghanikka... A, ajigeun danjang dahaeng'iguna? Haha, geureon myeongching'i mwoga jungyohagesseo.
|vo_08_12_tl         = Miss Jean from Gunnhildr Clan became the Grandmaster of the Knights of Favonius? It definitely suits her, her skills and honesty are famous... Ah, she's still Acting Grandmaster? Haha, those names aren't important.

|vo_08_13_title      = 유라에 대해…
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 유라・로렌스도 만나봤구나? 난 그 집 사람들의 성질이 더럽다는 것만 알아. 웬만하면 엮이지 않는 게 좋아. 아, 너랑 이런 얘길 하니까 몬드의 추억이 많이 생각나네… 정말 좋다
|vo_08_13_rm         = Yura Rorenseudo mannabwatguna? Nan geu jip saramdeurui seongjiri deoropdaneun geotman ara. Wenmanhamyeon yeokkiji anneun ge joa. A, neorang ireon yaegil hanikka Mondeu-ui chueogi mani saenggaknane... Jeongmal jotda.
|vo_08_13_tl         = You have met Eula Lawrence as well, huh? I only know that the people from Lawrence Clan doesn't have a good personality. It's best not to get close with them. Ah, talking with you about those makes me reminiscence many memories from Mondstadt... So nice.

|vo_09_01_title      = 토마에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 내가 뭐 도울 거 없어? 집안의 잡무, 대인관계 뭐든 말만 해. 어? 수다 떨자고…? 그렇구나. 그럼 좀 더 신경 써야겠는걸
|vo_09_01_rm         = Naega mwo doul geo eopsseo? Jibanui japmu, daeingwangye mwodeun malman hae. Eo? Suda tteoljago...? Geureotguna. Geureom jom deo singyeong sseoyagetneungeol.
|vo_09_01_tl         = Is there anything I can do to help? Chores, human relationships, anything. Huh? You want to chat with me...? Okay. I should take more care into it.

|vo_09_02_title      = 토마에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 내가 얘기한 적 있지? 나는 이나즈마 본토 사람이 아니야. 몬드에서 배 타고 왔지. 여기 분위기가 맘에 들고, 가주님과 아야카 아가씨처럼 친절한 사람을 만나서 아예 여기 남기로 한 거야
|vo_09_02_rm         = Naega yaegihan jeok itji? Naneun Inajeuma bonto sarami aniya. Mondeueseo bae tago watji. Yeogi bunwigiga maeume deulgo, gajunimgwa Ayaka agassicheoreom chinjeolhan sarameul mannaseo aye yeogi namgiro han geoya.
|vo_09_02_tl         = I've talked about it, right? I'm not born in Inazuma. I came here by ship from Mondstadt. I like the atmosphere here, and I have met kind people like the head of Kamisato Clan and Miss Ayaka, so I decided to stay here.

|vo_09_03_title      = 토마에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 사실 나도 고향 생각이 날 때가 많아. 그래서 이도에 있는 외국 상인들이 더 잘 이해되기도 하고, 많이 도와주고 싶어. 다른 점이라면 그들은 스스로를 잠깐 머물다 갈 손님이라고 생각해서 이나즈마에 섞이려 하지 않는다는 거야. 그러니 대다수의 이나즈마 사람들도 그들을 자기 사람으로 여기지 않지
|vo_09_03_rm         = Sasil nado gohyang saenggagi nal ttaega mana. Geuraeseo Idoe itneun oeguk sang'indeuri deo jal ihaedoegido hago, mani dowajugo sipeo. Dareun jeomiramyeon geudeureun seuseuroreul jamkkan meomulda gal sonnimirago saenggakhaeseo Inajeumae seokkiryeo haji anneundaneun geoya. Geureoni daedasu-ui Inajeuma saramdeuldo geudeureul jagi sarameuro yeogiji anchi.
|vo_09_03_tl         = I actually think of my hometown a lot. So I can understand the foreign merchants in Ritou well, and I want to help them a lot. The difference is that they think that they are just guests who will leave soon, so they don't try to mingle with Inazuma. So most Inazumans don't consider them a part of Inazuma, too.

|vo_09_04_title      = 토마에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 보수적인 이나즈마 사람에게 외국인이 봉행 가문의 가신이 된다는 건 상상도 하기 힘든 일이야. 그래서 좋지 않은 취급도 받았었지. 두 분이 애쓰지 않았다면, 나는 진작 쫓겨났을 거야. 그리고 카미사토 가문의 은혜에 보답하기 위해 노력했더니 사람들이 점점 날 받아들여줬어
|vo_09_04_rm         = Bosujeogin Inajeuma saramege oegugini bonghaeng gamunui gasini doendaneun geon sangsangdo hagi himdeun iriya. Geuraeso jochi anneun chwigeupdo badasseotji. Du buni aesseuji anatdamyeon, naneunjinjak jjotgyeonasseul geoya. Geurigo Kamisato gamunui eunhye'e bodaphagi wihae noryeokhaetdeoni saramdeuri jeomjeom nal badadeuryeojwosseo.
|vo_09_04_tl         = To a conservative Inazuman, a foreigner being the housekeeper of a Commissioner's Clan. So I haven't got good treatment before. If the two did not work hard, I would have been kicked out already. And when I made effort to repay the Kamisato Clan's kindness, people slowly and slowly accepted me.

|vo_09_05_title      = 토마에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 너한텐… 이런 얘길 해도 괜찮겠지? 사실 한동안 고향으로 돌아가고 싶었어. 몬드가 내 진정한 고향이니까. 하지만 이나즈마를… 버리기도 힘들더라고. 봐, 난 이나즈마 사람들에게 큰 은혜를 입었어&mdash;&mdash;카미사토 가문엔 나를 위한 방이 있고, 가족보다 더 가족 같은 사람도 있지. 힘든 부분도 있었지만, 날 도와준 사람들이 훨씬 많거든. 아무리 생각해 봐도 난 이나즈마에 남는 게 낫겠더라고. 그래도 계속 몬드가 생각난다면… 너랑 얘기하면 되지. 나 말 많다고 싫어하는 거 아니지?
|vo_09_05_rm         = Neohanten... Ireon yaegil haedo gwaenchangetji? Sasil handong'an gohyang'euro doragago sipeosseo. Mondeuga nae jinjeonghan gohyang'inikka. Hajiman Inajeumareul... beorigido himdeuldeorago. Bwa, nan Inajeuma saramdeurege keun eunhyereul ibeosseo &mdash; Kamisago gamunen nareul wihan bang'i itgo, gajokboda deo gajok gateun saramdo itji. Himdeun bubundo isseotjiman, nal dowajun saramdeuri hwolssin mankeodeun. Amuri saenggakhae bwado nan Inajeumae namneun ge natgetdeorago. Geuraedo gyesok Mondeuga saenggaknandamyeon... neorang yaegihamyeon doeji. Na mal mantago sireohaneun geo aniji?
|vo_09_05_tl         = To you... It would be okay to speak of this, right? I've actually wanted to return to my hometown for a long time. Mondstadt is my real home. But... It was also hard to leave Inazuma behind. See, I have received a lot of kindness from Inazumans &mdash; the Kamisato Clan has a room for me, and there is someone who feels like family more than family. There were hard times, but there are more people who helped me. No matter how much I think, it seemed better for me to stay in Inazuma. But even though I still think of Mondstadt... I can talk with you. You don't hate me because I talk too much, right?

|vo_10_01_title      = 토마의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 최근엔 괴담에 빠져있어. 변화무쌍한 요괴들의 이야기가 너무 신기한 거 있지. 예전엔 인술 같은 거에도 관심 많았고. 응? 관심이 빨리 식는 거 같다고? …그, 그런 거 아냐!
|vo_10_01_rm         = Choegunen goedame ppajyeoisseo. Byeonhwamussanghan yogoedeurui iyagiga neomu sin'gihan geo itji. Yejonen insul gateun geoedo gwansim manatgo. Eung? Gwansimi ppali sikneun geo gatdago? ...Geu, geureon geo anya!
|vo_10_01_tl         = I'm into ghost stroies recently. The stories of changeable monsters are so fascinating. I was quite interested in ninja skills some time ago. Hmm? You think my sparks die easily? ...T, That's not it!

|vo_10_02_title      = 토마의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 진짜 고민이 하나 있는데, 가주님이 밤에 친구들을 초대하셔서 내 솜씨를 보여주겠다고 했거든. 원래 버터 크랩을 만들려고 했는데, 어디서도 꽃게를 못 샀지 뭐야! 물속에 들어가서 직접 잡는 수밖에 없는 걸까?
|vo_10_02_rm         = Jinjja gomini hana itneunde, gajunimi bame chin'gudeureul chodaehasyeoseo nae somssireul boyeojugetdago haetgodeun. Wonrae beoteo keurabeul mandeullyeogo haetneunde, eodiseodo kkotgereul mot satji mwoya! Mulsoge deureogaso jikjeop jabneun subakke eopneun geolkka?
|vo_10_02_tl         = I really have a worry, because the head of Kamisato Clan told me that he would invite his friends at night and show them my skills. I was planning to make Butter Crab, but I couldn't buy crab anywhere! Should I go inside water and catch them by myself?

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 내가 가장 좋아하는 음식은 모둠 어묵탕이야. 냄비 한가득 푹 끓여서 다 같이 나눠 먹으면 아주 즐겁지
|vo_10_03_rm         = Naega gajang joahaneun eumsigeun modun eomuktang'iya. Naembi hangadeuk puk kkeuryeoseo da gachi nanwo meogeumyeon aju jeulgeopji.
|vo_10_03_tl         = My favorite food is Assorted Fish Cake Soup. It's very nice to boil it in a full pot and share the food together.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 음식은 딱히 없는데, 음료까지 포함이면… 난 술을 잘 못 마셔. 놀리지 마, 나도 내가 몬드 사람이 맞는 건지 의심해봤으니까. 어쨌든… 과음은 몸에 안 좋으니까, 오히려 잘 된 거 아닐까?
|vo_10_04_rm         = Euksigeun ttakhi eopneunde, eumryokkaji pohamimyeon... nan sureul jal mot masyeo. Nolliji ma, nado naega Mondeu sarami matneun geonji uisimhaebwasseunikka. Eojjaetdeun... gwaeumeunmome an joeunikka, ohiryeo jal doen geo anilkka?
|vo_10_04_tl         = I have nothing with food, but if it includes drinks... I can't drink alcohol well. Don't tease me, I've doubted myself whether I am a person from Mondstadt. Anyways... too much alcohol isn't good for your body, so it might be a good thing, eh?

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg

|vo_12_01_rm         = Nal ttarawa, ppalli! Ne saeng'ilinde dang'yeonhi an itji. Bwa, neol wihan patiya. Meogeul geo, masil geo, geurigo chin'gudeuldo isseo. He, ne tansaeng'eul ginyeomhaneun narinde, jeoldae honja oeropge bonaege haji aneul geoya!
